TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the elements for a StrongPoint and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates a StrongPoint with specific information. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the StrongPoint. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Battlespace Geometry' topic (for instance, any topic where the tested BSO is included). The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Control Feature and all its elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates the tactical graphic for a StrongPoint with specific information for the following attributes: * Name * Location * HostilityStatus=Friend * ValidityPeriod * IsActive=No * ReportingDataCategory=Planned
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the StrongPoint correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the StrongPoint with new values for the following attributes: * Location * HostilityStatus=Hostile * ValidityPeriod * IsActive=Yes * ReportingDataCategory=Reported
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the updated StrongPoint correctly.
